ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The regimen information (e.g., TWO WEEKS ON, TWO WEEKS OFF) may further clarify the dose administration and dose frequency. This may be pre-printed or collected. The sponsor may wish to create a codelist to collect this data consistently.
